seg.quote: I could not deny the truth of this statement.
Soon afterwards he made his first public statement about the affair.

sense.def:
A statement
je tudi tiskana listina, ki povzema ves denar, ki je bil vplačan ali dvignjen iz banke ali računa stanovanjske banke.
